MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK10 postcode area of Alloa, affecting properties in Charles Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 00:47AM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise forthe inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:05AM on 28 April 2021.
